text: Pre-chill the vodka in the freezer.  Pre-chill a 9-ounce wine glass in the freezer. Ensure not to leave it in for too long. Leave it in for a few minutes, making sure to watch it closely for cracks. Add a small handful of ice cubes into a glass.  Add Vodka into a cocktail mixer.  Add the raspberry liquor into the cocktail mixer.  Add the blue curacao into the cocktail mixer.  Add the lime cordial into the cocktail mixer.  Add the cranberry cocktail into the cocktail mixer.  Shake well.  Pour the drink into a glass.
